alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Gogebic; Marquette; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:43PM EST until February 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and lake effect snow expected. Snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches tonight, then additional lake effect snow amounts of 4 to 8 inches Friday morning through late Friday night, except an inch or less of additional snow in western and southern Marquette County and eastern Gogebic County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph leading to patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Ontonagon, Baraga, Marquette, Gogebic and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills of 15 to 25 below zero Friday night could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baraga; Gogebic; Marquette; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton
